title: Chi.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
....
... I'm sorry, I...
I don't...want
want to .... talk
<<if $escape_active is 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Chi.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Chi.EndDialog]]

title: Chi.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
.... 
.... why are you talking ....
to ... to me?
...

title: Chi.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
.... 
why do you keep trying to...
to... to talk to me?
[[I care about you|Chi.Day2.Evening.Start.Yes]]
[[I want to see if you'll say something|Chi.Day2.Evening.Start.No]]
[[I want something|Chi.Day2.Evening.Start.Maybe]]

title: Chi.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
Hey
"hey"
<<if $escape_active is 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Chi.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>

title: Chi.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
This is the end of the demo, please give me 350 large and 24 months
to finish this game
<<if $escape_active is 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Chi.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Chi.EndDialog]]

title: Chi.Day2.Evening.Start.Yes
body:
You....care about me?
You care about me??
I'm sorry
I'm not worth being cared about
"Don't say that"
Why do you care about me?
forget it
<<if $escape_active is 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Chi.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Chi.EndDialog]]

title: Chi.Day2.Evening.Start.Maybe
body:
.... well
I have nothing to say to you except
fuck off
<<if $escape_active is 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Chi.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Chi.EndDialog]]

title: Chi.Day2.Evening.Start.No
body:
Well...I don't have ..anything 
for you
...
look around you. None of us have anything
<<if $escape_active is 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Chi.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
